  • Method Details

    • search

      public static void search​(java.lang.String pattern, java.io.File folder, java.util.List<java.lang.String> result, int deep)
      Method to search the list of files that satisfies a pattern in a folder and it child folders. The list of files is stored in the result list.
      Parameters:
      pattern - pattern that the files must have
      folder - folder to look for the files
      result - array with the path of the files that have the pattern
      deep - deep to search

    • search

      public static void search​(java.lang.String nameFolder, java.lang.String patternName, java.io.File folder, java.util.List<java.lang.String> result, int deep)
      Method to search the list of files that satisfies a pattern in a folder with the name given. The list of files is stored in the result list.
      Parameters:
      nameFolder - name of the folder we want to search
      patternName - pattern of the files
      folder - main folder in which search the folder
      result - list of results
      deep - deep to search

    • searchFolders

      public static void searchFolders​(java.io.File parentDir, java.util.List<java.lang.String> folderList, int deep)
      Search for the child folders of the one given. The predictions and the temporal ones will not be added to the result
      Parameters:
      parentDir - directory in which search the folders
      folderList - list of folders on the parentDir
      deep - deep to search

    • searchDirectory

      public static void searchDirectory​(java.lang.String pattern, java.io.File folder, java.util.List<java.lang.String> result)
      Method to search the list of files that satisfies a pattern in a folder. The list of files is stored in the result list.
      Parameters:
      pattern - pattern that the files must have
      folder - folder to look for the files
      result - array with the path of the files that have the pattern

    • searchFoldersName

      public static void searchFoldersName​(java.io.File parentDir, java.lang.String folderName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> listResult, int deep)
      Search a folder/s in a directory given
      Parameters:
      parentDir - folder to search in
      folderName - name of the folder we are looking for
      listResult - list of folders that we are looking for
      deep - deep to search

    • containsExtension

      public static boolean containsExtension​(java.lang.String pattern, java.io.File folder)
      Check if there is any file with the pattern given
      Parameters:
      pattern - type of file to search
      folder - the folder in with want to search the files
      Returns:
      true id there is a file with that pattern

    • showResultsAndSave

      public static void showResultsAndSave​(java.lang.String dir, java.lang.String name, ij.ImagePlus imp1, ij.plugin.frame.RoiManager rm, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> goodRows, java.lang.String nameClass, boolean temp)
      Method to draw the results stored in the roi manager into the image, and then save the image in a given directory. Since we know that there is only one esferoide per image, we only keep the ROI with the biggest area stored in the ROI Manager.
      Parameters:
      dir - path of the directory to save the files
      name - name of the image
      imp1 - image in witch the roi was detected
      rm - roi manager that contains the information of the roi image
      goodRows - row of the result table we wants to save
      nameClass - name of the algorithm used to creates the roi
      temp - true if we are creating files in the temporal folder

    • getArea

      public static final double getArea​(java.awt.Polygon p)
      Method to obtain the area from a polygon. Probably, there is a most direct method to do this.
      Parameters:
      p - the polygon we want to know the area
      Returns:
      the area of the poligon

    • keepBiggestROI

      public static void keepBiggestROI​(ij.plugin.frame.RoiManager rm)
      Method to keep the ROI with the biggest area stored in the ROIManager, the rest of ROIs are deleted.
      Parameters:
      rm - roi manager with all the measures

    • getByFormat

      public static java.lang.String getByFormat​(java.lang.String format, java.util.List<java.lang.String> result)
      Get the files from a directory with a given extension
      Parameters:
      format - the extension of the file
      result - array with the path of the files with that extension in the folder
      Returns:
      the path of the directory

    • countBelowThreshold

      public static int countBelowThreshold​(ij.ImagePlus imp1, int threshold)
      Counts the pixels below the threshold
      Parameters:
      imp1 - imagePlus to process
      threshold - threshold
      Returns:
      number of pixels under the threshold

    • countBetweenThresholdOver

      public static boolean countBetweenThresholdOver​(ij.ImagePlus imp1, int threshold1, int threshold2, int num)
      Counts between the threshold
      Parameters:
      imp1 - imagePlus to process
      threshold1 - upper threshold
      threshold2 - under threshold
      num - num to check the threshold
      Returns:
      true if in the middle of the threshold

      Parameters:

    • optionAction

      public static boolean optionAction()
      Search if we hae tiff files(processed images) in the current directory and subdirectories deep 2.
      Returns:
      true if tiff files found

    • createGeneralViewOrNot

      public static void createGeneralViewOrNot​(java.lang.String dc, boolean selectAlgo)
      Checks if there is a main frame. if it is, repaint the tabpanel if not create a new one
      Parameters:
      dc - the path of the current directory
      selectAlgo - true if process images and false otherwise

    • menuItemActive

      public static boolean menuItemActive​(java.lang.String nameMenuItem)
      Checks if have a directory with that name and if it is enable or not.
      Parameters:
      nameMenuItem - name of the menu we want to know if is enable
      Returns:
      true if it is enable

    • changeUsedAlgoritms

      public static void changeUsedAlgoritms()

    • showResultsAndSaveNormal

      public static void showResultsAndSaveNormal​(java.lang.String dir, java.lang.String name, ij.ImagePlus imp1, ij.plugin.frame.RoiManager rm, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> goodRows)
      Saves the imageJ image in the directory predictions.
      Parameters:
      dir - directory where the original image is
      name - name of the image
      imp1 - imageJ Image
      rm - roi manager
      goodRows - list of rows

      Parameters:

      location - path to save the file
      Returns:
      file dowload
